caption:
The photograph depicts a bustling beach scene filled with people enjoying a sunny day. The setting seems lively and vibrant, reflecting a typical summertime beach atmosphere.

In the foreground, two individuals are prominently featured lying on the sand. The person on the left is wearing a purple bikini and has her arms stretched out, while the one on the right is in denim shorts and a bikini top, lying on her stomach with her head tilted in relaxation. Both appear to be sunbathing.

The beach is densely populated with people engaged in various activities. Most visitors are sprawled out on towels, sunbathing. There are both solo beachgoers and groups, creating a patchwork of colorful beachwear and accessories spread across the sand. A few beach umbrellas are visible, offering shade.

Towards the middle distance, more people can be seen closer to the shoreline, walking along the edge of the water or standing and looking out to the sea. The ocean appears calm with moderate waves, and there are no visible boats or swimmers in the water.

Further in the background, the beach continues with more people enjoying the day. The horizon is clear, showing a bright blue sky without clouds, which suggests a warm and sunny day, ideal for beach activities. The overall scene captures a lively and enjoyable day at the beach, filled with people relaxing and soaking up the sun.
title: Misquamicut state beach, most Westerly of the barrier beaches along Rhode Island's southwest coast.  Overuse and over-development threatens natural ecology of these beaches
